Name: CosmoDrive:Infinity
About the game: CosmoDrive: Infinity is a sequel to CosmoDrive: Zero. Immerse yourself in a breakneck journey across the universe! Open new ships and new planets. This time you will travel from sunny locations to ice and cold. There will also be strange abstract universes along the way that need to be studied. Features: ✔ Nice graphics ✔ Excellent sound accompaniment ✔ About 8 kinds of ships ✔ Several randomly generated universes ✔ Bonuses that make gameplay more interesting
